price: 74 Si Nous ne t’avions pas raffermi, tu aurais pu pencher quelque peu vers eux.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن ثَبَّتۡنَٰكَ لَقَدۡ كِدتَّ تَرۡكَنُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا قَلِيلًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walawlā an thabbatnāka laqad kidtta tarkanu ilayhim shayan qalīlan
